评论概述: A beautiful sexy shirt, that even a well kept 70 year old can sport!
评论详情: I am 6'4", at 195lbs, and the XL fit just fine. I would normally order a size large, but the XL just fit my broad shoulders. A hard lucky guess On-Line. The body runs wider than the fit of most shirts, which is good because the design of the shirt should have a blousy elegant look. I was trying to go for a large black shirt, as I intend to wear a black leather blazer over. I ended up happy with the XL, as my arms are quite long, and the drape of the shirt would not look as fine as it does. I purchased my black leather blazer thru Amazon,BGSD, ($199+) and now this beautiful shirt. I added black retro shoes from AMAZON again, (Cole Haan ($108) ),on sale. I also wear Amazon jeans (20+I guess). The fit is like my Calvin's, but the price is ...so much less!  Ok, take a chance , you have a month to decide, and I'm pretty sure your better half will love this., (just say'n). This is one of the finest outfits I have ever put together.  When I walked out to the mailbox today everyone, yes everyone, who walked by me stopped to tell me how great I looked. When you reach 70, anyone who pays a compliment makes a GREAT day, extra complements feels like the Lottery! Great shirt, nice buttons, nice fit. The length is good and long, and the cut makes the floral pattern stand out. When light casts across the shirt, the illuminated areas are covered with floral design, and the other designs fade back into the black background. This shirt looks great under a black leather blazer. Do not hesitate, the material is quality, and the drape looks so good across the chest! This shirt feels freaking awesome! Guys, take a chance, you have a month to decide, I know you're better half will love it😍 If she has ever looked at a romance novel, she will see you.. wearing this s*xy shirt saving the damsel (her) . So, if you're looking to turn up your game..this is a very fine place to start.

Bought this shirt out of impulse for the rare occasions I get to go outside for fun. This time of year is hot where I am and the material was very nice and breathable and lightweight!! The sleeves were a little wonky to keep rolled up, but all in all great! Get lots of compliments on it!
Perfect just like advertised, great quality and fits great.
